FUNCTION setbetterthresh, input idedsuns = idsuns(input) n_suns = n_elements(idedsuns) peaks = setbetterpeak(input,n_suns) thresharr = REPLICATE({reg:0,thresh:0.},n_suns) for i = 0,n_suns-1 do begin thresharr[i].reg = (idedsuns[sort(idedsuns)])[i] thresharr[i].thresh = (peaks.sorted)[peaks.peakarr[i]] endfor return,thresharr end
